biotools.summary: NeoFox (NEOantigen Feature tOolboX) is a toolbox for annotating neoantigen candidates with neoantigen features. NeoFox annotates neoantigen candidate sequences with published neo-epitope descriptors.

bioschemas.name: NeoFox
bioschemas.summary: NeoFox (NEOantigen Feature tOolboX) is a toolbox for annotating neoantigen candidates with neoantigen features. NeoFox annotates neoantigen candidate sequences with published neo-epitope descriptors.
